triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the core technology used to create the agent populations studied in the paper.

triples.name: Convention (norm)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes how social conventions spontaneously emerge in LLM populations.

triples.name: Collective behavior
triples.relevance: The paper proposes how collective biases can emerge from populations without individual bias.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The study examines decentralized populations of LLM agents functioning as a multi-agent system.

triples.name: Natural language
triples.relevance: LLM agents communicate through natural language in the study.

triples.name: AI alignment
triples.relevance: The paper discusses implications for AI alignment with human values and societal goals.
